title: What are some examples of quantitative research papers? - Quora

response.answer_text: Quantitative research involves the testing of independent (predictor) and dependent (outcome) variables for correlations (relationships) and/or differences. Quantitative research papers can be located in the major dissertation repositories, such as Proquest, as well as published in research journals. If interested, a copy of my quantitative dissertation can be found on my website (see profile) in the download section.
